data.name: BasicSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can set up the basic settings for your site.

data.name: plPortalName.Help
data.value: This is the Title for your portal. The text you enter will show up in the Title Bar.

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description about your site here.

data.name: plKeyWords.Help
data.value: Enter some keywords for your site (separated by commas). These keywords are used by search engines to help index your site.

data.name: plLogo.Help
data.value: Depending on the skin chosen, this image will appear in the top left corner of the page.

data.name: plPortalSkin.Help
data.value: The selected skin will be applied to all pages on the site, unless overridden at the Page level.

data.name: plPortalContainer.Help
data.value: The selected container will be applied to all modules on the site, unless overridden at the Page or Module level.

data.name: plAdminSkin.Help
data.value: The selected skin will be applied to all admin pages on the site.

data.name: plAdminContainer.Help
data.value: The selected container will be applied to all admin modules on the site.

data.name: plBackground.Help
data.value: Depending on the skin, if selected, an image will display in the background of all pages.

data.name: AdvancedSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can set up more advanced settings for your site.

data.name: plUserRegistration.Help
data.value: The type of user registration allowed for this site

data.name: plSplashTabId.Help
data.value: The Splash Page for your site.

data.name: plHomeTabId.Help
data.value: The Home Page for your site.

data.name: plLoginTabId.Help
data.value: The Login Page for your site.

data.name: plUserTabId.Help
data.value: The User Page for your site.

data.name: plCurrency.Help
data.value: The Currency used on the site.

data.name: plProcessor.Help
data.value: The Payment Processor used to handle payments on the site.

data.name: plUserId.Help
data.value: The UserId for the Payment Processor.

data.name: plPassword.Help
data.value: User Password for the Payment Processor.

data.name: plFooterText.Help
data.value: If supported by the skin this Copyright text is displayed on your site.

data.name: plBannerAdvertising.Help
data.value: What type of Banner Advertising do you want on your site.

data.name: plAdministrator.Help
data.value: The Administrator User for the site.

data.name: plDefaultLanguage.Help
data.value: The Default Language for the site.

data.name: plTimeZone.Help
data.value: The TimeZone for the location of the site.

data.name: plPortalAlias.Help
data.value: The Portal Alias is the url used to reach the portal.

data.name: plExpiryDate.Help
data.value: The Expiry Date is the date that the Hosting Contract for the portal expires.

data.name: plHostFee.Help
data.value: The Hosting Fee is the monthly charge for hosting this site.

data.name: plHostSpace.Help
data.value: The amount of Disk Space in MB allowed for this site (enter 0 for unlimited space).

data.name: plSiteLogHistory.Help
data.value: The number of days of site activity that is kept for this site.

data.name: plDesktopModules.Help
data.value: Premium modules are only available to specific portals

data.name: DeleteMessage.Text
data.value: Are You Sure You Wish To Delete This Portal ?

data.name: LastPortal.Text
data.value: You Can Not Delete The Last Portal In Your Database

data.name: plHomeDirectory.Help
data.value: Enter the Home Directory for this site

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Site Settings

The Site Settings module represents the local options for your portal. Local settings allow you to customize your portal to meet your business requirements.

data.name: RestoreCCSMessage.Text
data.value: Are You Sure You Want To Restore The Default Stylesheet (All Changes To The Current Stylesheet Will Be Lost) ?
